original_text: And they were there with David for three days, eating and drinking, for their brothers had made preparation for them.
korean_text: 무리가 거기서 다윗과 함께 사흘을 지내며 먹고 마셨으니 이는 그들의 형제가 이미 식물을 준비하였음이며

sentences.original_text: And they were there with David for three days
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 거기서 다윗과 함께 사흘을 있었으며

sentences.original_text: for their brothers had made preparation for them
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들의 형제들이 그들을 위해 준비하였기 때문입니다
